body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Govr of Kentucky --
Respected Sir
I have referred to the record & the fine in ^vs^ Fred. Kecks is Fifty Dolls & six months imprisonment I drew the petition in haste & forgot to state the fine --
I am sir as ever with great respect yr obt servt
